surface.zone: and companion. But it is your hap piness I desire as well as my own felicity when I declare to you that our marriage would reader me eternally miserable unless it were the dictate of your own free choice. Even now I weep when I co think that borne down as you are by the cruellest misfortunes you may stifle by the word honor all hope of that love & happiness which would alone conduce to your felicity
